channel.title: Seeking a spot in the Wiki
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Seeking a spot in the Wiki"

item.title: Re: Seeking a spot in the Wiki
item.content:encoded: I can't really insure a spot at the moment. Only time I know a spot's opened up is when people stop playing. And people rarely announce that they've stopped playing :(

item.title: Re: Seeking a spot in the Wiki
item.content:encoded:
Hmmâ€¦ still waiting for a response. If there isn't enough room, then I will probably join another village. I need a response as soon as possible. Right now, I am in a near bingo lock, idling and wasting away my stamina on D-Ranks.

If there's a considerable haze on the current situation, then I probably will just join another. Whatever works.

item.title: Re: Seeking a spot in the Wiki
item.content:encoded:
At this point, I am not entirely sure. The kage of my current village has been gone for 9 days. If she never shows up, then I will swap my main for my alt, and then be seeking a permanent spot.

But as for right now, I at least need a temporary spot. I could join, and leave if someone needs it if necessary.

item.title: Re: Seeking a spot in the Wiki
item.content:encoded: I'm kind of having trouble keeping track of everything at the moment. I know Bayard is currently out dealing with other stuff, so his spot is reserved, and I think someone currently in the village is only here to make a Sannin run. Are you looking for a permanent spot or just a spot for a Sannin run?

item.title: Seeking a spot in the Wiki
item.content:encoded: Hello everyone. I'm about to start my Sannin run, and was wondering if there was an open spot in the Wiki for my main, Atama. I realize that there's a waiting list, but if there's room I'd love to join. Any info on how long it is would be great. Thanks. :)
